events.title: Harry Potter and the Philosopher's Stone
events.description: Harry Potter, an eleven-year-old orphan, discovers that he is a wizard and is invited to study at Hogwarts. Even as he escapes a dreary life and enters a world of magic, he finds trouble awaiting him.

events.title: Harry Potter and the Chamber of Secrets
events.description: A house-elf warns Harry against returning to Hogwarts, but he decides to ignore it. When students and creatures at the school begin to get petrified, Harry finds himself surrounded in mystery.

events.title: Harry Potter and the Prisoner of Azkaban
events.description: Harry, Ron and Hermoine return to Hogwarts just as they learn about Sirius Black and his plans to kill Harry. However, when Harry runs into him, he learns that the truth is far from reality.

events.title: Harry Potter and the Goblet of Fire
events.description: In his fourth year at Hogwarts, Harry must reluctantly compete in an ancient wizard tournament after someone mysteriously selects his name, while the Dark Lord secretly conspires something sinister.

events.title: Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix
events.description: Harry Potter and Dumbledore's warning about the return of Lord Voldemort is not heeded by the wizard authorities who, in turn, look to undermine Dumbledore's authority at Hogwarts and discredit Harry.

events.title: Harry Potter and the Half-Blood Prince
events.description: Dumbledore and Harry Potter learn more about Voldemort's past and his rise to power. Meanwhile, Harry stumbles upon an old potions textbook belonging to a person calling himself the Half-Blood Prince.

events.title: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows: Part 1
events.description: Harry, Ron and Hermione go into hiding as Voldemort takes over the Ministry of Magic. Later, the trio tries to decipher the clues left to them by Dumbledore to find and destroy Voldemort's Horcruxes.

events.title: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows: Part 2
events.description: Harry, Ron and Hermione set out on a quest to eliminate the remaining horcruxes. On the other hand, the students and teachers must unite to defend Hogwarts against Lord Voldemort and his minions.
